trans-unit.source: The EXTERNAL NAME clause specifies the Java method to be called in a <xref href="rrefcreatefunctionstatement.dita#rrefcreatefunctionstatement">CREATE FUNCTION statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefcreateprocedurestatement.dita#rrefcreateprocedurestatement">CREATE PROCEDURE statement</xref>, and it specifies a Java class in a <xref href="rrefsqljcreateaggregate.dita#rrefsqljcreateaggregate">CREATE AGGREGATE statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype">CREATE TYPE statement</xref>.

seg-source.mrk: The EXTERNAL NAME clause specifies the Java method to be called in a <xref href="rrefcreatefunctionstatement.dita#rrefcreatefunctionstatement">CREATE FUNCTION statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefcreateprocedurestatement.dita#rrefcreateprocedurestatement">CREATE PROCEDURE statement</xref>, and it specifies a Java class in a <xref href="rrefsqljcreateaggregate.dita#rrefsqljcreateaggregate">CREATE AGGREGATE statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype">CREATE TYPE statement</xref>.

target.mrk: The EXTERNAL NAME clause specifies the Java method to be called in a <xref href="rrefcreatefunctionstatement.dita#rrefcreatefunctionstatement">CREATE FUNCTION statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefcreateprocedurestatement.dita#rrefcreateprocedurestatement">CREATE PROCEDURE statement</xref>, and it specifies a Java class in a <xref href="rrefsqljcreateaggregate.dita#rrefsqljcreateaggregate">CREATE AGGREGATE statement</xref> or a <xref href="rrefsqljcreatetype.dita#rrefsqljcreatetype">CREATE TYPE statement</xref>.

trans-unit.source: The singleQuotedString cannot have any extraneous spaces.

seg-source.mrk: The singleQuotedString cannot have any extraneous spaces.

target.mrk: The singleQuotedString cannot have any extraneous spaces.

trans-unit.source: The method name specified in the CREATE FUNCTION or CREATE PROCEDURE statement normally takes the following form:

seg-source.mrk: The method name specified in the CREATE FUNCTION or CREATE PROCEDURE statement normally takes the following form:

target.mrk: The method name specified in the CREATE FUNCTION or CREATE PROCEDURE statement normally takes the following form:

trans-unit.source: If the class is a static nested class, or if the method is in a static nested class, use a dollar sign ($) as a separator between the outer and static class. For example, suppose you have the following class and method definition:

seg-source.mrk: If the class is a static nested class, or if the method is in a static nested class, use a dollar sign ($) as a separator between the outer and static class.
For example, suppose you have the following class and method definition:

target.mrk: If the class is a static nested class, or if the method is in a static nested class, use a dollar sign ($) as a separator between the outer and static class.
For example, suppose you have the following class and method definition:

trans-unit.source: public class TestFuncs { public static final class MyMath { public static double pow( double base, double power ) { return Math.pow( base, power ); } } }

seg-source.mrk: public class TestFuncs { public static final class MyMath { public static double pow( double base, double power ) { return Math.pow( base, power ); } } }

target.mrk: public class TestFuncs { public static final class MyMath { public static double pow( double base, double power ) { return Math.pow( base, power ); } } }

trans-unit.source: If you use CREATE FUNCTION to bind this pow method to a user-defined function, the external name should be TestFuncs$MyMath.pow, not TestFuncs.MyMath.pow.

seg-source.mrk: If you use CREATE FUNCTION to bind this pow method to a user-defined function, the external name should be TestFuncs$MyMath.pow, not TestFuncs.MyMath.pow.

target.mrk: If you use CREATE FUNCTION to bind this pow method to a user-defined function, the external name should be TestFuncs$MyMath.pow, not TestFuncs.MyMath.pow.

trans-unit.source: -- Specify the Mode class as an external name CREATE DERBY AGGREGATE mode FOR INT EXTERNAL NAME 'com.example.myapp.aggs.Mode';

seg-source.mrk: -- Specify the Mode class as an external name CREATE DERBY AGGREGATE mode FOR INT EXTERNAL NAME 'com.example.myapp.aggs.Mode';

target.mrk: -- Specify the Mode class as an external name CREATE DERBY AGGREGATE mode FOR INT EXTERNAL NAME 'com.example.myapp.aggs.Mode';

trans-unit.source: -- Specify the pow method in the static class MyMath CREATE FUNCTION MYPOWER ( X DOUBLE, Y DOUBLE ) RETURNS DOUBLE PARAMETER STYLE JAVA NO SQL LANGUAGE JAVA EXTERNAL NAME 'TestFuncs$MyMath.pow'

seg-source.mrk: -- Specify the pow method in the static class MyMath CREATE FUNCTION MYPOWER ( X DOUBLE, Y DOUBLE ) RETURNS DOUBLE PARAMETER STYLE JAVA NO SQL LANGUAGE JAVA EXTERNAL NAME 'TestFuncs$MyMath.pow'

target.mrk: -- Specify the pow method in the static class MyMath CREATE FUNCTION MYPOWER ( X DOUBLE, Y DOUBLE ) RETURNS DOUBLE PARAMETER STYLE JAVA NO SQL LANGUAGE JAVA EXTERNAL NAME 'TestFuncs$MyMath.pow'
